MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Respiration | d: Mitosis

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Energy processing | c: Photosynthesis | d: Cell division

MCQ: Which level of organization in biology studies the molecular biology of a cell?
Choices: a: Ecology | b: Genetics | c: Physiology | d: Cell biology

MCQ: What emerged more than 3.7 billion years ago on Earth?
Choices: a: Dinosaurs | b: Humans | c: Life | d: Plants
